text: @realDonaldTrump Idea, all of you that must open the country now, go ahead go to work and party it up. BUT when you get sick with Covid-19 you stay the fuck home then! Don’t go to the hospital, DO NOT take a bed from someone that was trying to stay safe. Stay the fuck home and recover or die.
